definitions.definition: The work involved in performing an activity; exertion.
definitions.example: It took a lot of effort to find a decent-sized, fully-furnished apartment within walking distance of the office.   He made a conscious effort to not appear affected by the stories in the paper.
Although he didn't win any medals, Johnson's effort at the Olympics won over many fans.

definitions.definition: A force acting on a body in the direction of its motion.
